meanings.definition: The state or quality of being against reason or logic.
meanings.sent1: Her antirationalities confused everyone in the class.
meanings.sent2: The professor could not understand the antirationalities of the conspiracy theorists.
meanings.sent3: The antirationalities of the cat trying to catch its own tail provided comic relief.
meanings.sent4: In the debate, his arguments were a whirlwind of antirationalities.
meanings.sent5: The dark forest was filled with the eerie whispers of antirationalities.

meanings.definition: Actions or beliefs that go against rational thought.
meanings.sent1: The group's antirationalities led to their downfall.
meanings.sent2: It is important to challenge antirationalities with critical thinking.
meanings.sent3: The antirationalities of the robot trying to dance were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His decisions were a maze of antirationalities, leading to chaos.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a world consumed by antirationalities.
